title: Spicy coconut rice, Trinidadian Style
ingredients: ['80g grated, fresh coconut', '475ml milk', '475ml water', '6 tablespoons oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 large clove garlic, crushed', '1 1/2 tablespoons mild or hot curry powder', '1 hot Scotch bonnet pepper to taste, or dash of Cayenne pepper', '370g uncooked rice']
